comment.author: 10733061@N05
comment._content:
Never see a photo of him before, but one of his steam hammers was installed in Eccles, Manchester UK  and was featured on the Eccles Grammar School Badge, worn on blazers for many years.
His hands look as though they've seen hard graft.
I notice that he's holding dividers, but any idea what the book is?

comment.author: 20724457@N00
comment._content: The steam hammer ushered in the possibilty of mass production and the era of great steam ships.
